Welcome to EON Elevators

South India’s Trusted Elevator Solutions Partner — licensed, ISO-certified, and committed to innovation & service excellence.

Our Product Range

  • NEST Series Elevators
  • METRO Series Elevators
  • SUMMIT Series Elevators

The NEST Series is our villa-focused home elevator range, created for effortless installation and everyday elegance. Built on a compact, machine-room-less architecture, NEST slips into tight shafts or open atriums with minimal civil work, no deep pit, and whisper-quiet operation. Its modular rails and plug-and-play wiring shorten site time dramatically, letting homeowners upgrade vertical mobility without disrupting family life.

  1. Ideally suited for G+3 to G+10 floors
  2. Load bearing capacity of 4 to 15 people
NEST Series Key Features
  1. IS 17900 and EN 81 Compliant
  2. Bi-directional Safety
  3. Zero-Chipping Design
  4. Retrofit Ready
  5. Trim Level
    • Terra: Essential cosmetic options
    • Aer: Additional customization options
    • Sol: With luxury fittings options
Talk To Our Tech Expert Explore Products
  • Aeris Model
  • Aegis Model
  • Evora Model
  • Plexus Model
  • Axira Model
  • GLT Model

The AERIS Advantage

  • Designed for Minimal Disruption: Installed without chipping, reduces dust, noise, and civil work — ideal for working buildings and retrofits.
  • Advanced Passenger Safety: Equipped with bi-directional safety systems for secure operation.
  • Highly Scalable: From 4 stops to 10, supporting travel up to 30 meters at 1 m/s.
  • Compact Yet Capable: Maximizes usable floor area while minimizing footprint.
  • Custom Experience: Available in Terra, Aer, and Sol trims with MS/SS cabins, glass options, RGB lighting, TFT displays.

The AEGIS Advantage

  • Low Civil Footprint: Minimal pit and overhead required, ideal for flexible structures.
  • Built-in Emergency Safety: Controlled descent systems for safe operation during faults.
  • Heavy-Duty Performance: Load capacities from 272 kg to 2040 kg — from homes to freight.
  • Quiet by Design: Whisper-quiet operation for sensitive environments.
  • Custom Interiors: Available in Terra, Aer, and Sol trims.

The EVORA Advantage

  • Designed for Elevation: Travel up to 90 meters — perfect for ambitious high-rises.
  • Fleet-Ready Efficiency: Suited for group operations and traffic coordination.
  • Smart Safety Systems: Compliant bidirectional systems ensure protection.
  • Flexible to Fit: Adapts to new builds and modernization projects.
  • Custom Interiors: Available in Terra, Aer, and Sol trims.

The PLEXUS Advantage

  • Multi-Side Access: Configurable with 1 front and up to 2 side openings — ideal for corner and split-level layouts.
  • Space-Conscious Integration: Perfect for narrow shafts and minimal civil work.
  • Smooth, Safe, and Silent: Bi-directional safety systems ensure secure, quiet operation.
  • Custom Interiors: Available in Terra, Aer, and Sol trims.

The AXIRA Advantage

  • Ultra-Slim Shaft Readiness: Installs into narrow and older shafts — ideal for retrofits.
  • Flexible Traffic Handling: Smart control systems enable smooth group operation and reduced wait times.
  • Wide Opening Configurations: Supports 1 front + 2 side openings for architectural flexibility.
  • Custom Interiors: Available in Terra, Aer, and Sol trims.

The GLT Advantage

  • Optimized for Basics: Designed where practicality and cost-effectiveness matter most.
  • Efficient Installation: Requires minimal structural changes, ready for standard fitment.
  • Front + Opposite Openings: Supports 1 front and 1 rear opening for simple layouts.
  • Smooth and Safe Ride: Bi-directional safety and soft-start/stop comfort.
  • Streamlined Interiors: Clean design in Terra and Aer trims for elegant simplicity.

About Us

We Are Bengaluru’s Trusted Elevator Partner

At EON Elevators, we blend engineering excellence with customer care. From design to maintenance, we focus on affordability, professionalism, and continuous innovation. We ensure long-term performance and customer confidence.

  • Affordable Prices
  • Competent Professionals
  • 24/7 Friendly Support
  • Insurance Payment

Vision

To be an enterprise that demonstrates high ethical standards and achieve exponential economic growth by optimal utilization of resources through innovative solutions driven by a highly motivated team of diligent individuals.

Mission

Having 10 long years of expertise in the field, capable of operating variety of elevators in the industry. We oath to deliver optimum caliber of elevator installation and services.

Quality

We believe quality is not something to be achieved but it is something to live with. We work towards accomplishing top notch quality by internally established procedures through a pragmatic approach ensuring quality remains the core concern of our business.

Celebrating 12+ Years of Smooth Rides and Safe Landings!

At EON Elevators, our journey is built on trust, innovation, and uncompromising safety. With over a decade of experience in designing, installing, and maintaining elevators across South India, we have become a reliable partner for residential, commercial, and hospitality projects.

With a relentless focus on advanced engineering, seamless design, and sustainable practices, we have redefined vertical transportation standards in India. From high-rise residential towers to state-of-the-art commercial spaces, our elevators and escalators stand as a testament to our expertise and reliability.

Driven by customer satisfaction and industry recognition, we continue to raise the bar in vertical mobility — making every ride a promise of safety and comfort.

Advanced Technology

Our elevators combine IoT intelligence, predictive maintenance, and advanced control systems, supported by technologies like GMV and Arkel, creating a strong foundation for continuous innovation and long-term reliability.

Unmatched Reliability

Built with proven components and strict quality checks, EON elevators deliver consistent uptime and dependable performance for every ride.

Comprehensive Service

From custom design to seamless installation and ongoing maintenance, EON provides complete lifecycle support to ensure every elevator runs safely and efficiently.

Safety First

Every EON elevator is built to international standards, including IS 17900 and EN 81 compliance, with features like bi-directional safety gears, emergency auto rescue, and overload protection — ensuring worry-free mobility every ride.

Customization Excellence

From premium residences to large-scale commercial projects, EON delivers tailored elevator solutions with flexible designs, finishes, and features to match every unique requirement.

Ready to Experience the EON Difference?

Discover how our elevators can bring safety, comfort, and elegance to your space. Join the growing community of customers who trust EON for their vertical mobility needs.

🏗️ Home Lift Requirement Form

Q1. What type of house do you live in?
Q2. How many floors need lift access?
Q3. Who will primarily use the lift?
Q4. What is your approximate budget range?
Q5. Available space inside your house for installation?
Q6. Do you already have a lift shaft / provision?
Q7. What load capacity do you need?
Q8. What type of drive system do you prefer?
Q9. What is your expected timeline for installation?
Q10. Do you need additional features?
Your Contact Details

Firstly, congrats on owning a Villa! For us to recommend the right Elevator for your need, we would request you to answer 5 quick 'sizing' queries.

Q1. How many floors is the Elevator required for?
Q2. What would be the max passenger capacity for your Elevator?
Q3. How many openings you would prefer?
Q4. Our Elevators can operate at 4 different speeds. The standard one is at 1m/s that normally is used in Villas. However please select the preferred speed.
